name: Cube Grid
description:
A platform grid is generated and a valid path is created in it.

Try to reach the end platform to win.

You can customize the grid size and choose to keep the path displayed or not.

Controls: 

PS4 Controller: X to jump, Left joystick to move, Right joystick to look.

Keyboard and mouse: ZQSD to move, mouse to look, Space to jump.
